===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[hit]], to [[strike]], to [[tap]], to [[rap]], to [[knock]]
#* {{zh-x|他 '''敲''' 了 門。|He '''knocked''' on the door.}}
#* {{zh-x|剛剛 '''敲''' 過 了 八點鐘，不 是 嗎？|It has just '''struck''' eight, hasn't it?}}
# to [[rip off]], to [[overcharge]]
#* {{zh-x|那 家 旅館 '''敲''' 觀光客 的 竹 杠。|That hotel '''rips off''' the tourists.}}
#* {{zh-x|他們 '''敲''' 了 你 多少 錢？|How much did they screw you for?}}
# to [[blackmail]]
